summary: A small interactive house with a nice view of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]-[/size][color=#6d9eeb][size=5] Description [/size][/color][size=5]-[/size]

[size=3]A small interactive home in a dwemer house with a backstory and an amazing view of Skyrim.
Turn on/off lights, fires, change bedding, take a shower or just steam yourself in the bath.
It was built for player and one follower, or just the player.

[/size][size=3]The house is [u]NOT[/u] visible on the map, so go to Whiterun's market place and have a look around.
Then go and explore !

[u][color=#ff7700]NO DLCs REQUIRED[/color][/u][/size]


[size=5]-[/size][color=#6d9eeb][size=5] Features[/size][/color][size=5] -[/size]

[/font][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]->[/color][font=Comic Sans MS] Navmeshed, cleaned with TES5Edit, Horse and map marker (discover it)[/font]
[/size][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][color=#6d9eeb]->[/color] All vanilla crafting, Garden (not plantable)
[color=#6d9eeb]->[/color] Lots of activators and markers for the player
[color=#6d9eeb]->[/color] NPCs will unequip and equip gear when entering or leaving bathtub
[color=#6d9eeb]->[/color] Relax area above the house and a lookout above the relax area
[color=#6d9eeb]->[/color] Bottomless bag
[color=#6d9eeb]->[/color] Lockable doors (activate the key in your inventory)[/size]

[size=3][color=#6d9eeb]Thing to note:[/color] Steam valve (bathtub) and cook pot can only be activated/moved when the fireplace is lit.
Fireplace can be extinguished when the above have been deactivated/moved back.[/size]


[/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Other Mods[/url] -[/size][/font][/center]
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod

Special thanks to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4324947/?]Hoamaii[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62903/?]Bottomless Bag[/url]
[/size][/font][/center]
author: 1xmiha
